description: Snake Plant, Mother in Law's Tongue, whatever you call them, these plants are e-a-s-y to take care of. In this fun bundle, we offer the tropical plant that doesn't mind living inside. Requires very little water! You'll get 2 beautiful varieties!

The White Stripe Dragon Tree (Dracaena Warneckii) grows best in medium light, out of direct sun (but can handle low-light), making them a perfect choice for greening up your desk and office. Requires a little more water than the snake plants.

Brighten up any space with the lemon-lime dragon tree. They are an indoor plant that thrives in medium light levels, with colorful and spiky leaves that bring drama to any space. With stripes of dark and vivid green, as well as bright yellow, it's easy to see where they get their citrus-inspired name.
data.title: Dungeons and Dragons Bundle
